## ActionDefinition.dependencies property

Optional array of vies keys that the action depends upon during execution.

These views will automatically be synced to the current version just before the action is executed and are made available via the [ActionContext.view()](./paramodel.actioncontext.view.md) function.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
dependencies?: Dependencies;
```
